resources.string: External storage isn\'t available. Please make sure that your device is disconnected from a computer and that your SD card is inserted (if applicable) and restart the app.
Preparing Game environment, please wait a moment...
Sorry, this game requires at least 800x480 resolution in order to run, your device can not run this game.
Extracting Game Files. This will only occur just installed or upgraded, but may take a while.
File extract failed, this may be the extraction path is incorrect!
Preparing environment failed. Please make sure external storage have enough space and try again.
Not enough external storage space(at least need to 50MB), clean up some useless files and try this app again!
Reselect device type window will show again when you next launch the game.
Download another app named \'Music4ThemeHospital\' from google play, and launch it to extract music data. then you can turn on the nice music in game.
